mapper.select: INSERT INTO attendance (user_no, attend_date,attend_start, attend_end, attend_status) VALUES(#{user_no}, #{attend_date},#{attend_start}, #{attend_end}, #{attend_status}) RETURNING attend_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO overtime (attend_no, overtime_content, overtime_reason, overtimeapp_user_no, overtime_time, overtimeapp_status, overtimeapp_reason, overtime_date, overtime_type) VALUES(#{attend_no}, #{overtime_content}, #{overtime_reason}, #{overtime_user_no}, NULL, 2, #{overtimeapp_reason}, now(), #{overtime_type})
